overview:
Traackr’s in-residence geek. Started Traackr as a way to scratch an itch and is excited to see an idea grow and evolve into a game changing business.

David knows 15 languages, 1 dead and 11 of which are only spoken by computers. David holds a master in computer science from the Institut National des Sciences Appliquees.

David lives in Cambridge, MA with his lovely wife Carrie.

“I have been programming for 30 years (no, really), that’s 83% of my life, if you were wondering. During that time stumbled upon the Internet before it was the web, developed a web site for spies (but never was one), learned about Buddhism while writing one of the first on-line interactive game, helped mad scientists with experimental software on auditory cortex research, tried to read the the human genome, headed a team that developed enterprise grade web applications.”
